#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=VIII .
#Text=The Crooked Man
#Text=One summer night , a few months after my marriage , I was seated by my own hearth smoking a last pipe and nodding over a novel , for my day ’s work had been an exhausting one .
#Text=My wife had already gone upstairs , and the sound of the locking of the hall door some time before told me that the servants had also retired .
#Text=I had risen from my seat and was knocking out the ashes of my pipe when I suddenly heard the clang of the bell .
#Text=I looked at the clock .
#Text=It was a quarter to twelve .
#Text=This could not be a visitor at so late an hour .
#Text=A patient , evidently , and possibly an all-night sitting .
#Text=With a wry face I went out into the hall and opened the door .
#Text=To my astonishment it was Sherlock Holmes who stood upon my step .
#Text=“ Ah , Watson , ” said he , “ I hoped that I might not be too late to catch you . ”
#Text=“ My dear fellow , pray come in . ”
#Text=“ You look surprised , and no wonder !
#Text=Relieved , too , I fancy ! Hum !
#Text=You still smoke the Arcadia mixture of your bachelor days then ! There ’s no mistaking that fluffy ash upon your coat .
#Text=It ’s easy to tell that you have been accustomed to wear a uniform , Watson .
#Text=You ’ll never pass as a pure-bred civilian as long as you keep that habit of carrying your handkerchief in your sleeve .
#Text=Could you put me up to-night ? ”
#Text=“ With pleasure . ”
#Text=“ You told me that you had bachelor quarters for one , and I see that you have no gentleman visitor at present .
#Text=Your hat-stand proclaims as much . ”
#Text=“ I shall be delighted if you will stay . ”
#Text=“ Thank you .
#Text=I ’ll fill the vacant peg then .
#Text=Sorry to see that you ’ve had the British workman in the house .
#Text=He ’s a token of evil .
#Text=Not the drains , I hope ? ”
#Text=“ No , the gas . ”
#Text=“ Ah !
#Text=He has left two nail-marks from his boot upon your linoleum just where the light strikes it .
#Text=No , thank you , I had some supper at Waterloo , but I ’ll smoke a pipe with you with pleasure . ”
#Text=I handed him my pouch , and he seated himself opposite to me and smoked for some time in silence .
#Text=I was well aware that nothing but business of importance would have brought him to me at such an hour , so I waited patiently until he should come round to it .
#Text=“ I see that you are professionally rather busy just now , ” said he , glancing very keenly across at me .
#Text=“ Yes , I ’ve had a busy day , ” I answered .
#Text=“ It may seem very foolish in your eyes , ” I added , “ but really I do n’t know how you deduced it . ”
#Text=Holmes chuckled to himself .
#Text=“ I have the advantage of knowing your habits , my dear Watson , ” said he .
#Text=“ When your round is a short one you walk , and when it is a long one you use a hansom .
#Text=As I perceive that your boots , although used , are by no means dirty , I cannot doubt that you are at present busy enough to justify the hansom . ”
#Text=“ Excellent ! ” I cried .
#Text=“ Elementary , ” said he .

#Text=“ It is one of those instances where the reasoner can produce an effect which seems remarkable to his neighbour , because the latter has missed the one little point which is the basis of the deduction .

#Text=The same may be said , my dear fellow , for the effect of some of these little sketches of yours , which is entirely meretricious , depending as it does upon your retaining in your own hands some factors in the problem which are never imparted to the reader .

#Text=Now , at present I am in the position of these same readers , for I hold in this hand several threads of one of the strangest cases which ever perplexed a man ’s brain , and yet I lack the one or two which are needful to complete my theory .
#Text=But I ’ll have them , Watson , I ’ll have them ! ”
#Text=His eyes kindled and a slight flush sprang into his thin cheeks .
#Text=For an instant only .
#Text=When I glanced again his face had resumed that red-Indian composure which had made so many regard him as a machine rather than a man .
#Text=“ The problem presents features of interest , ” said he .
#Text=“ I may even say exceptional features of interest .
#Text=I have already looked into the matter , and have come , as I think , within sight of my solution .
#Text=If you could accompany me in that last step you might be of considerable service to me . ”
#Text=“ I should be delighted . ”
#Text=“ Could you go as far as Aldershot to-morrow ? ”
#Text=“ I have no doubt Jackson would take my practice . ”
#Text=“ Very good .
#Text=I want to start by the 11.10 from Waterloo . ”
#Text=“ That would give me time . ”
#Text=“ Then , if you are not too sleepy , I will give you a sketch of what has happened , and of what remains to be done . ”
#Text=“ I was sleepy before you came .
#Text=I am quite wakeful now . ”
#Text=“ I will compress the story as far as may be done without omitting anything vital to the case .
#Text=It is conceivable that you may even have read some account of the matter .
#Text=It is the supposed murder of Colonel Barclay , of the Royal Mallows , at Aldershot , which I am investigating . ”
